code: export let EmailStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(EmailStatus){EmailStatus["RECEIVED"]="RECEIVED";EmailStatus["PROCESSING"]="PROCESSING";EmailStatus["INTENT_DETECTED"]="INTENT_DETECTED";EmailStatus["ASSIGNED"]="ASSIGNED";EmailStatus["IN_PROGRESS"]="IN_PROGRESS";EmailStatus["RESPONDED"]="RESPONDED";EmailStatus["CLOSED"]="CLOSED";EmailStatus["ESCALATED"]="ESCALATED";return EmailStatus;}({});export let EmailIntent=/*#__PURE__*/function(EmailIntent){EmailIntent["REFUND_REQUEST"]="REFUND_REQUEST";EmailIntent["BUG_REPORT"]="BUG_REPORT";EmailIntent["FEATURE_INQUIRY"]="FEATURE_INQUIRY";EmailIntent["GENERAL_SUPPORT"]="GENERAL_SUPPORT";EmailIntent["BILLING_ISSUE"]="BILLING_ISSUE";EmailIntent["TECHNICAL_SUPPORT"]="TECHNICAL_SUPPORT";EmailIntent["COMPLAINT"]="COMPLAINT";EmailIntent["FEEDBACK"]="FEEDBACK";EmailIntent["UNKNOWN"]="UNKNOWN";return EmailIntent;}({});export let Priority=/*#__PURE__*/function(Priority){Priority["LOW"]="LOW";Priority["MEDIUM"]="MEDIUM";Priority["HIGH"]="HIGH";Priority["URGENT"]="URGENT";return Priority;}({});export let TeamStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(TeamStatus){TeamStatus["ACTIVE"]="ACTIVE";TeamStatus["INACTIVE"]="INACTIVE";TeamStatus["ARCHIVED"]="ARCHIVED";return TeamStatus;}({});export let UserRole=/*#__PURE__*/function(UserRole){UserRole["ADMIN"]="ADMIN";UserRole["MANAGER"]="MANAGER";UserRole["AGENT"]="AGENT";UserRole["VIEWER"]="VIEWER";return UserRole;}({});export let UserStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(UserStatus){UserStatus["ACTIVE"]="ACTIVE";UserStatus["INACTIVE"]="INACTIVE";UserStatus["BUSY"]="BUSY";UserStatus["OFFLINE"]="OFFLINE";return UserStatus;}({});
